mapper.select: SELECT employee_no employeeNo, employee_name employeeName, employee_phone employeePhone, employee_email employeeEmail, employee_gender employeeGender, createdate, updatedate FROM employee_detail WHERE employee_no = #{employeeNo}

SELECT employee_no employeeNo, branch_no branchNo, employee_id employeeId, employee_active employeeActive, createdate, updatedate FROM employee e WHERE e.branch_no = ( SELECT branch.branch_no FROM branch WHERE branch_level = 1 )
